patthana15.78:1.1: Saraṇaṃ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… sahajāte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.78:2.1: Saraṇaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… sahajāte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.78:3.1: Araṇaṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
